bioconda.name: revbayes
bioconda.summary: Bayesian Phylogenetic Inference Using Graphical Models and an Interactive Model-Specification Language.

biocontainers.name: revbayes
biocontainers.summary: Bayesian phylogenetic inference using probabilistic graphical models and an interactive language.

biotools.summary: RevBayes provides an interactive environment for statistical computation in phylogenetics. It is primarily intended for modeling, simulation, and Bayesian inference in evolutionary biology, particularly phylogenetics. However, the environment is quite general and can be useful for many complex modeling tasks.

bioschemas.name: RevBayes
bioschemas.summary: RevBayes provides an interactive environment for statistical computation in phylogenetics. It is primarily intended for modeling, simulation, and Bayesian inference in evolutionary biology, particularly phylogenetics. However, the environment is quite general and can be useful for many complex modeling tasks.
